trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Printing" /> namespace provides print-related services for Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Printing" /> fornece serviços relacionados à impressão para aplicativos Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Typically, when you print from a Windows Forms application, you create a new instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> class, set properties, such as <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>, that describe how to print, and call the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method to actually print the document.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, quando você imprime a partir de um aplicativo do Windows Forms, você cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> classe, definir propriedades, tais como <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>, que descrevem como imprimir e chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> método realmente imprimir o documento.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, which should be handled to perform the document layout for printing.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento, que deve ser tratado para executar o layout de documento para impressão.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> object obtained from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to specify the output to print.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> obtido do objeto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos para especificar a saída de impressão.

trans-unit.source: If you are printing a text file, use <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> to read one line at a time from the stream and call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method to draw the line in the graphics object.
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver imprimindo um arquivo de texto, use <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> para ler uma linha por vez o fluxo e chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> método para desenhar a linha no objeto de gráfico.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this process, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> classes.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre esse processo, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> e <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> classes.

trans-unit.source: You can view an example of printing a text document in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Você pode exibir um exemplo de impressão de um documento de texto no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> tópico de visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class are not supported for printing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> não há suporte para a classe para impressão.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, use o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> métodos de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> classe.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> controls how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> controles como um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> é impresso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method invokes the print controller's <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> methods, which in turn tell the printer how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método invoca o controlador de impressão <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> métodos, que por sua vez indicam a impressora como imprimir o documento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing dialog boxes, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre caixas de diálogo de impressão, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog>.

trans-unit.source: The print-preview process uses a specialized print controller, dialog box, and control.
trans-unit.target: O processo de visualização de impressão usa um controlador de impressão especializado, caixa de diálogo e controle.

trans-unit.source: For an example of such a print controller and dialog box, see <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de um controlador de impressão e caixa de diálogo, consulte <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>.

trans-unit.source: Classes within the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service.
trans-unit.target: Classes dentro de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace não têm suporte para uso dentro de um serviço do Windows ou serviço ou aplicativo ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de usar essas classes de dentro de um desses tipos de aplicativo pode gerar problemas inesperados, como diminuído exceções de desempenho e tempo de execução de serviço.

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser imprimir a partir de um aplicativo do Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), consulte o <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
